valsi.definition: abstractor: property/quality abstractor (-ness); $x_{1}$ is quality/property exhibited by [bridi].
klama modal, 1st place gone to by ...
$m_1$ is an axe for cutting $k_2$ with blade $m_3=k_1$ propelled by $m_4$.
$d_1$ is an incisor of $d_2$.
$x1=k1=v1$ cuts off $x2=k3=v2$ from $x3=k2=v3$, leaving $x4=k3=v4$
modal aspect: innate capability; possibly unrealized.
krati modal, 1st place represented by ...
$s_1$ is the concept of representative democracy (default: political representative democracy) as it applies to the governance of $t_2$ based on the works of thinker(s) $s_3$
digit/number: imaginary i; square root of -1.
$s_1=k_1$ is sickly/appears healthy to observer $s_3$ by standard $k_2$.
evidential: I know by cultural means (myth or custom).
$x_1$ scores/gains a point against $x_2$ in competition/game/contest $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a cup/glass/tumbler/mug/vessel/[bowl] containing contents $x_{2}$, and of material $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: A kabri is normally eaten from by lifting it; a palta is not. See also {palta}, {citka}, {blaci}, {tansi}.

valsi.definition: $d_1$ is $d_2$ cupful(s).
$k_1$ is $k_2$ (quantifier, default: one) cupfuls in quantity.
$x_{1}$ is a camera/photographic equipment recording illumination type $x_{2}$ images to medium $x_{3}$.
$p_3$ takes a photo/picture $p_1$ depicting/representing/showing $p_2$.
$p_1$ is a photograph of $p_2$ taken by photographer $p_3$ in medium $p_4$=$k_3$.
$p_1$ is a sequence of numbers in ascending order.
$x_{1}$ reflects Canadian culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$k_1=f_1=b_1$ is the Canadian French language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$k_1=g_1=b_1$ is the Canadian English language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$k_1=g_1$ is Canada
$x_{1}$ coughs/farts/burps up/out $x_{2}$ [predominantly gaseous] from orifice $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is caffeine with chemical purity $x_2$
$j_1$ is the president/[chairperson of the board] of $j_2=k_1$.
$x_{1}$ is a company/corporation/firm/partnership chartered by authority $x_{2}$ for purpose $x_{3}$.
$f_1$ is a corporate officer.
$p_1$ is a business park managed by community/polity/company $p_2$ for businesses/firms/corporations of type $k_3$..
$t_2 $ is a/the private computer network that includes nodes/computers $t_1=s_1$ whose function/purpose is $s_2$, installed across organization $k_1$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {kagni}, {skami}, {tcana}, {mujysamseltcana}, {internet}, {intranet}. May or may not be an intranet.

valsi.definition: $d_2 $ is/are the indebtedness/liabilities of company/corporation/firm $d_1=k_1$ to creditor(s) $d_3$ for the provision of goods /services/loans $d_4$.
$p_2$ is/are an/the asset(s) of company/corporation/firm/partnership $p_1=k_1$ according to law $p_3$.
$r_1$ is CEO (Chief Executive Officer)/MD (Managing Director) of company/corporation/firm $t_2=k_1$.
ckaji modal, 1st place characterizing ...
$x_{1}$ (event/experience) warns/cautions $x_{2}$ (person) of/about danger $x_{3}$ (event/state/property).
valsi.notes: Agentive warning (= {jdegau}, {jdezu'e}); an attempt to warn which may not succeed (= {jdetoi}, {jdegautoi}, {jdezuktoi}). See also {ckape}, {nupre}, {snura}, {tcica}, {xlura}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a shelf/counter/bar in/on/attached to supporting object $x_{2}$, for purpose $x_{3}$.
$t_1=k_2$ is a cupboard for storing $t_2$, made of $t_3$, with shelves $k_1$.
$x_{1}$ is able to do/be/capable of doing/being $x_{2}$ (event/state) under conditions $x_{3}$ (event/state).
valsi.notes: Also: has talent; know how to; know how to use (= {plika'e}). (cf. stati, certu, gasnu (in the time-free potential sense), cmavo list ka'e, cmavo list nu'o, cmavo list pu'i, djuno, zifre)

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (agent) digs $x_{2}$ [material] up/out of $x_{3}$ [source/hole] with limbs/tool(s) $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also $x_1$ cuts into $x_3$ (with material removal). See also {katna}, {plixa}, {sraku}, {canpa}, {sraku}.

valsi.definition: $c_1=k_4$ is an excavator/power shovel for digging in $k_3$, operated by $k_1=c_3$.
$s_1$ is a sob/sobbing produced by $k_1$ with tears $k_2$ about/for reason $k_3$ (event/state).
$x_1$ is a teardrop wept by $x_2$ for reason $x_3$.
$b_1=k_1$ is an eyeball (body part) of $k_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the feces/excrement/dung/shit of $x_{2}$ (animal/person); (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is fecal (matter).
$v_1=k_2$ defecates/shits/poos.
$g_1$ is an eyelid of eye $k_1=g_2$.
$ke_1$ is an eyelash (body part) of $ke_2=ka_2$.
$x1=k2=g1$ winks/blinks
$x_1$ is a squid/cuttlefish of species $x_2$.
$ke_1$ is an eyebrow (supraorbital ridge) of $ke_2=ka_2=m_2$.
$x_{1}$ (portal/passage/entrance-way) is open/ajar/not shut permitting passage/access to $x_{2}$ by $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is chaotic/disordered in property/aspect $x_{2}$ (ka).
$x_1=v_2$ is a tear/tear fluid of $x_2=v_1$.
$x_{1}$ hunts/stalks prey/quarry/game $x_{2}$ for purpose $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also verb: to fish (= {fipkalte}). See also {jersi}, {kavbu}, {sisku}, {rivbi}.

valsi.definition: $v_1=k_2$ weeps/lacrimates tear(s) $v_2$ from $v_3$ via means/route $v_4$.
$k_1$ is the greatness/majesty/splendour/magnificence/grandeur of $b_1$ according to standard $b_3$.
$k_1$ is a security condition of $b_1$ protecting $b_2$ from threat $b_3$.
valsi.notes: When used as "security", x3 is a planned threat. "security" is comparable to "safety" ({kamnu'a}), "reliability" ({kamylacri}), and "continuity" ({kamra'i}).

valsi.definition: $k_1$ is quality/property exhibited by $b_1$ of being foolish/silly/stupid in event/action /property (ka) $b_2$.
$x_1$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of camphor (chemical compound)
$x_1$ is a society; $x_1$ is social
$x_{1}$ is a column/pillar of material $x_{2}$.
$m_1$ tests/evaluates/measures $j_1$'s knowledge of facts (du'u) $j_2$ in subject area $j_3$ as $m_3$ units on scale $m_4$ with accuracy $m_5$
valsi.notes: The x2 through x4 places are = m2

valsi.definition: $k_1=b_1$ is a vertebra of $b_3$ ; $b_3$ is a vertebrate.
$x_1$ is a leek of variety $x_2$.
$kam_1$ is the health of $kan_1$ by standard $kan_2$.
$x_{1}$ (mass) is a committee with task/purpose $x_{2}$ of body $x_{3}$.
$k_1$ is the majesty of $t_1=n_1$ being a regent/monarch of $t_2$ by standard $n_2$.
$x_{1}$ (property - ka) is common/general/universal among members of set $x_{2}$ (complete set).
valsi.notes: Only fully universal sense applies; $x_1$ must be found in all members of $x_2$. For the non-universal sense see {fadni} and {zilfadni}. See also {cafne}, {rirci}, {fadni}, {cnano}, {tcaci}, {lakne}, {cmima}, {simxu}.

valsi.definition: $k_1$ is the relation of $s_1$ to $s_2$.
$x_1$ reflects Welsh language/culture in aspect $x_2$.
$k_1$ is the speed of $s_1$ doing/being/bringing about $s_2$.
$k_1$ is the fatigue of $t_1$ in being/doing $t_2$ (event).
$k_1$ is the strength of $t_1$ in property/quality $t_2$ (ka).
$c_1$ is the childhood (state of being a child) of $v_1$.
$k_1$ is the power of $v_1$ in aspect $v_2$ under conditions $v_3$.
$x_1$ is the quality of whom/what is free to do/be $x_2=z_2$; $x_1$ is freedom/liberty of $x_2=z_2$
$x_{1}$ is a goat/angora/[billy-goat/kid] of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is Capricornus [astronomical constellation]/Capricorn [astrological sign].
valsi.notes: From goat (={kanba}). Capricornus is Latin for "horned male goat" or "goat horn". Anyway, both male and female of the genus Capra have horns.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is January of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) counts the number in set $x_{2}$ to be $x_{3}$ [number/count] counting [off] by units $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is dim/dull/pale/non-intense in property $x_{2}$ (ka) as received/measured by observer $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: In colors, indicates unsaturated, pastel, pale (though blabi can also indicate a kind of paleness). See also {blabi}, {carmi}, {klina}, {linto}, {manku}, {murse}, {ruble}, {skari}, {milxe}, {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {crino}, {grusi}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xekri}, {xunre}, {zirpu}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a candir√∫ of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a kangaroo of species/breed $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ calculates/reckons/computes $x_{2}$ [value (ni)/state] from data $x_{3}$ by process $x_{4}$.
$j_1=k_1$ is a watch (portable timepiece) measuring time units $j_2$ to precision $j_3$ with timing mechanism $j_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the eye [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: sensory apparatus]; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is ocular.
$x_1$ expects/looks for the occurence of $x_2$ (event), expected likelihood $x_3$ (0-1, default li so'a (i.e. near 1)); $x_1$ subjectively evaluates the likelihood of $x_2$ (event) to be $x_3$.
valsi.notes: The value of $x_3$ is a subjective estimate of likeliness according to $x_1$, and is the basic determinant of whether kanpe means something like "hope" or "wish" or "expect", although kanpe never carries the connotation of desire; for that connotation see {pacna}. kanpe with $x_3$ not very close to 1 has no simple equivalent in English, but for objects/states with negligible expectation it is something like "wishing"; if the state is plausibly likely, it is something like "hoping". In both cases, though, the English implication of emotional desire is not present. The value will usually be expressed using inexact numbers ("{li} {piso'u}" to "{li} {piro}"); non-desirous wish (= ??), non-desirous hope (= ??); (cf. {djica}, {pacna})

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is healthy/fit/well/in good health by standard $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is with/accompanies/is a companion of $x_{2}$, in state/condition/enterprise $x_{3}$ (event/state).
valsi.notes: $x_1$ is together with/along with $x_2$. See also {kagni}, {jorne}, {gunma}, {girzu}, {lasna}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ do $x_2$ together.
$x_{1}$ is a quantum/ray/elementary particle/smallest measurable increment of property/activity $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Quantum ray (= {bonka'u}). (cf. selci for masses and most objects; ratni, gradu, gusni, nejni, linji)

valsi.definition: $xa_1=k_1$ is a roommate of/lives with $k_2$ at location/habitat/nest/home/abode $x_3=xa_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a conjunction, stating that $x_{2}$ (du'u) and $x_{3}$ (du'u) are both true.
$cikna_1=skapi_2$ experiences goose bumps.
$k_1$ is a skin pore of pelt/skin/hide/leather $k_2=s_1$ from $x_3=s_2$.
$x_1$ is a chili/bell pepper (Capsicum) of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1=p_1$ is a tattoo/body art/brand/[image on the body] depicting $x_2=p_2$ on animal/body part $x_3=s_2$ made by artist $x_4=p_3$
$x_{1}$ [observer] compares $x_{2}$ with $x_{3}$ in property $x_{4}$ (ka), determining comparison $x_{5}$ (state).
$x_{1}$ is a car/automobile/truck/van [a wheeled motor vehicle] for carrying $x_{2}$, propelled by $x_{3}$
$c_1$ is a sandal for protecting feet $c_2$, and of material $c_3$.
$x_1=c_1=k_2$ is a self-propelled artillery gun for use against $x_2$ by $x_3$, launching projectile $c_2$ propelled by $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a card [small nearly-2-dimensional shape/form] of material $x_{2}$, shape $x_{3}$.
$f_1$ is in the genus Dorstenia, species $f_2$
$g_1$ opens portal/passage/entranceway $k_1$, permitting access to $k_2$ by $k_3$.
$x_{1}$ (object/commodity/property/event) is costly/expensive/dear to $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= poskargu for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {vamji}, {dirba}, {vajni}, {jdima}, {pleji}, {canja}, {jerna}, {jinga}, {jemna}, {sfasa}, {vecnu}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is hibiscus of species/variety $x_2$.
$k_1$ is a wolverine of variety $k_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a collar/ring/belt/band around/surrounding $x_{2}$ made of material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a journal/periodical/magazine/[newspaper] with content $x_{2}$ published by $x_{3}$ for audience $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$ may be a subject, but not all journals have a single subject; all have some sort of principle defining what is included, so this need not be a list. See also {papri}, {pelji}, {tcidu}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is the $x_3$'rd issue/number of journal/periodical/magazine/publication $x_2$ with content $x_4$ published by $x_5$ for audience $x_6$ .
$x_{1}$ is an open-break with broken piece $x_{2}$.
$j_1=k_3$ hatches from eggshell $j_2=p_1=k_1$
valsi.notes: {kalri}+{porpi}+{jbena} This is based on the lujvo {karpo'i}, glossed as "something breaks open". It is not obvious to me whether any of $k_2$ (portal destination), $p_2$ (pieces of broken thing), $j_3$ (birthdate), or $j_4$ (birthplace) are appropriate to include in this lujvo.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is a vowel sound.
$x_1$ is safflower of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is Georgian (Caucasus) in aspect $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a caravan consisting of $x_2$ traveling across/through $x_3$
$x_1$ is a katakana (Japanese syllabary) of sound $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ (tool/blade/force) cuts [through]/splits/divides $x_{2}$ (object) into pieces $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: For $x_1$ force, it is a force acting as a blade, not acting upon a blade; agentive cutting (= {ka'argau}, {ka'arzu'e}). (cf. kakpa, sraku for cutting into without division; plixa, dakfu, jinci, porpi, spofu, tunta, xrani, fatri, fendi, balre, dilcu)

valsi.definition: $x1=k1=p1$ is a huntsman, hunting $x2=k2$
discursive: marks word serving as focus of indirect question: "I know WHO went to the store".
$x_1$ is a salamander of family/genus/species $x_2$.
$d_2=k_1$ is common sense to knowers $d_1=k_2$ about subject $d_3$ by epistemology $d_4$.
$x_{1}$ captures/catches/apprehends/seizes/nabs $x_{2}$ with trap/restraint $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Catch something thrown (= {rerkavbu}). See also {jersi}, {kalte}, {pinfu}, {sisku}, se {rinju}.

valsi.definition: start grouping of tanru, etc; ... type of ... ; overrides normal tanru left grouping.
pro-sumti: relativized sumti (object of relative clause).
elidable terminator: end of tanru left grouping override (usually elidable).
open interval bracket marker; modifies intervals in non-logical connectives; exclude boundaries.
vocative: please repeat.
discursive: repeating - continuing.
discursive: repeating - continuing.
$x_1$ repeats $x_2$ (sedu'u/text) to audience $x_3$ via expressive medium $x_4$ for the $x_5$th time.
$x_{1}$ (person) pities/feels sorry for $x_{2}$ (person) about $x_{3}$ (abstraction).
elidable terminator: end abstraction bridi (often elidable).
$x_1=d_1=k_1$ wants to play with plaything $x_2=d_2=k_2$ for purpose $x_3=d_3$.
$k_1=g_1$ is a team / play group together playing / playing with plaything / toy / game $k_2=g_2$; members are from set $g_3$ linked by relations $g_4$.
$x_1$ is a moving piece used in a game $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a board used for playing the game $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ [agent] plays with plaything/toy $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Play game (= {ci'erkei}), play competitively (= {jvikei}). See also {jivna}, {jinga}, {zdile}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ plays croquet against $x_2$ in competition $x_3$ for prize/title $x_4$.
$g_1$ is a game master/dungeon master for players $k_1=g_2$ in role-playing game $g_3$.
$x_1$ is a turn/move by player $x_2$ in game $x_3$.
$ku_1$ is a die/are dice for game $x_2$ with surfaces/sides $ku_3$ (default 6).
valsi.notes: Shortened from ke nu kelci ke'e kubli. Omitted $ku_2$ (dice have always three dimensions). Cf. {cu'arkubli}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ degree(s) Kelvin [metric unit] in temperature (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ degrees Fahrenheit in temperature by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a cancer [malignant disease] in $x_{2}$.
$r_{1}$ (event/substance) effects/physically causes cancer (of type) $r_{2}$=$k_{1}$ under conditions $r_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is outer space near/associated with celestial body/region $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the hair/fur [body-part] of $x_{2}$ at body location $x_{3}$.
$l_1$ is earwax/cerumen.
$x_{1}$ is a/the ear [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: sensory apparatus, information gathering].
$n_1=b_1$ is an eardrum (tympanic membrane) of $n_2=k_2$.
valsi.notes: The tympanic membrane separates the external ear from the middle ear. Cf. {kerlo}, {tirna}, {sance}.

valsi.definition: $k_1=z_1$ is an earlobe of $k_2=z_2$.
$x_1$ is astronomy based on methodology $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ reflects South American culture/nationality/geography in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ has a body mass index of $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a cavity/hole/hollow/cavern in $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is concave within $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ is hollow at locus $x_{1}$.
valsi.notes: Also pit, depression, concavity; hollow (= {selke'a}). See also {fenra}, {kunti}, {canlu}, {canko}, {galxe}, {tubnu}.

valsi.definition: $ci_1=cu_1$ is a woodpecker/wryneck/piculet/sapsucker of species $ci_2$
$k_1=xe_1=j_1$ is a cleft/dimple chin of $xe_2$.
$k_1=z_1$ is a cave for housing $x_2=z_2$, located in $x_3=k_2$.
tense/modal: set/use tense default; establishes new open scope space/time/modal reference base.
attitudinal question: confusion about something said.
Converts following cmevla or zoi-quote into a nonce interjection/attitudinal.
non-question: understanding of something said.
$z_1=k_1$ applauds/acclaims/praises loudly action $z_2$ (object/event) with sound $k_2$.
$c_1=k_1$ shouts/cries out $c_2=k_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) to audience $c_3$ via expressive medium $c_4$
vocative: thanks - no thanks to you.
vocative: thanks - no thanks to you.
ckini modal, 1st place (related to) relatively; as a relation of ...
digit/number: number comma; thousands.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ kilograms in mass by standard $g_3$.
$x_1$ is $x_2$ kilometres long in direction $x_3$ by standard $x_4$.
krinu modal, 1st place (justified by) justifiably; because of reason ...
sumti question asking for a rational explanation/justification; why?.
krinu modal, 1st place despite reason ...
$d_1$ uploads $d_2$ to $d_3=k_1$.
$x_1$ pertains to the internet/cyberspace in aspect $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Proposed by xorxes. Short rafsi -kib-. Cf. {mujysamseltcana}.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is a web browser for retrieving/presenting/traversing information $k_1$.
$ki_1=ka_1$ is an internet-journal/web-article/blog (web-log) with content $ka_2$ published by $ka_3$ for audience $ka_4$
$p_1$ is a web page of site $p_2=k_1$.
$x_{1}$ cushions $x_{2}$ with material $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is a cushion/pillow/pad [for $x_{2}$] of padding material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of oxygen (O); [metaphor: supporting life/combustion].
$c_1$ lacks oxygen $k_1$; $c_1$ is anaerobic.
$x_{1}$ spear/lance/assegai made of $x_{2}$.
$x_1=xa_1=g_1=k_1$ is a lance/spear/javelin/pointed-rod weapon for use against $x_2=xa_2$ by $x_3=xa_3$ of material $x_4=g_2$.
valsi.notes: {kinli} {grana} {xarci}; this lujvo structure is from {noralujv}. The author of this definition is uncertain that {jesxa'i} would not be a better lujvo for the purpose.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a thousand [1000; $10^3$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_1$ is kinda like $x_2$ in property $x_3$
valsi.notes: This is a joke word. Its main use is in the tanru {kinda} {sorta}

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is sharp/keen at locus $x_{2}$.
$p_1=s_3=s_4$ thinks about subject $p_2=s_2$ by imagining $s_1$ which is like an imaginary movie about that subject.
$x_1=s_1$ is a frame from motion picture $x_2=k_1$ about $x_3=k_2$ [plot/theme/subject/activity]
$x_{1}$ reflects Pakistani/Pashto culture/nationality/language in aspect $x_{2}$.
$k_1=b_1$ is the Pakistani Urdu language used by $b_2$ to communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote)
$k_1=g_1=b_1$ is the Pakistani English language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$k_1=g_1$ is Pakistan.
valsi.notes: Cf. {kisto}, {gugde}, {gugdepuku}. The 'national' language of Pakistan is {xurbau}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is pottery made by $x_2$ of clay $x_3$.
$b_1$ is a clay-based building brick of composition $k_2$, surfaces/sides $s_4$.
$x_1$ is a potter who makes $x_2$ out of clay $x_3$.
$c_1$ calls/summons $c_3=k_1$ to location $k_2$ in manner/form $c_4$.
$j_1=k_1$ follows $j_2$ to destination $k_2$ from origin $k_3$ via route $k_4$ by means $k_5$.
$x_{1}$ is a street/avenue/lane/drive/cul-de-sac/way/alley/[road] at $x_{2}$ accessing $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also corridor; not typically a route between points, but offers access to sites along it. See also {naxle}, {panka}, {pluta}, {dargu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ weeps/cries tears $x_{2}$ about/for reason $x_{3}$ (event/state).
$x_{1}$ comes/goes to destination $x_{2}$ from origin $x_{3}$ via route $x_{4}$ using means/vehicle $x_{5}$.
valsi.notes: Also travels, journeys, moves, leaves to ... from ...; $x_1$ is a traveller; ($x_4$ as a set includes points at least sufficient to constrain the route relevantly). See also {cadzu}, {bajra}, {marce}, {vofli}, {litru}, {muvdu}, {cpare}, cmavo list {ka'a}, {pluta}, {bevri}, {farlu}, {limna}, {vitke}.

valsi.definition: $m_1$ summons $m_2=k_1$ to $k_2$ from $k_3$ via route $k_4$.
$x_1=k_1=m_1$ arrives at $x_2=k_2$ from $x_3=k_3$ by route $x_4=k_4$ with transportation means $x_5=k_5$ by completion standard $x_6=m_3$
$x_{1}$ is a quantity quantified/measured/enumerated by $x_{2}$ (quantifier) on scale $x_{3}$ (si'o).
valsi.notes: Also count. See also cmavo list {la'u}, {namcu}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ measures $x_2$ bels on scale $x_3$ (si'o).
valsi.notes: One bel is equal to 10 decibels. Cf. {klani}, {sance}, {cladu}.

valsi.definition: $g_1$ is $g_2$ joule(s) of energy (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ farad(s) of capacitance (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ newton (s) of force (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ pascal(s) of pressure (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ tesla(s) of magnetic field B (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ volt(s) of electromotive force (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ henry/henries of inductance (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ hertz of frequency (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ ohm(s) of electrical impedance/resistance (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ watt(s) of power (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ siemens of electrical conductance (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$p_1$ is a track on $p_2$
$x_1=s_1=k_1$ drives $x_2=s_2=k_5$ to $x_3=k_2$ from $x_4=k_3$ via route $x_5=k_4$
valsi.notes: Used to specify agentive operation of the transportation vehicle, as opposed to simply being carried by it. See also: {sazri}, {klama}, {ma'ekla}

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is blackseed/nigella of species/variety $x_2$
$x_{1}$ (mass/si'o) is a class/category/subgroup/subset within $x_{2}$ with defining property $x_{3}$ (ka).
valsi.notes: Also taxon, type, kind, classification, species, genus, family, order, phylum. See also cmavo list {le'a}, {cmima}, {jutsi}, {ciste}, {girzu}, {lanzu}, {vrici}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (object/medium) is clear/transparent/without obstacle to in-the-clear $x_{2}$ [transmission].
valsi.notes: Also lucid; $x_2$ remains apparent/lucid/clear (figurative use for 'understandable' is discouraged, better expressed as = {filseljmi} or {filsmu}). (cf. {kandi}, {zunti} - {nalzu'i} is better for 'unhindered')

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of halogen of type $x_{2}$ [chlorine, fluorine, iodine, etc.].
valsi.notes: Also bromine; default chlorine. See also {xukmi}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of a clear/transparent carbonated beverage/soda of sweet flavor, of brand $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Not any carbonated beverage, but one which is transparent and with sweet flavor, like Sprite (=sprait), 7-up, Sockerdricka (=a soft drink that is consumed in Sweden) or similar. Another flavor may be added and expressed as a tanru, as long as the combination doesn't differ too much from the characteristics of klisodva.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of clay [moist, clammy dirt] of composition including $x_{2}$.
$c_1=b_1=k_1$ is a jumper of material $c_2$.
$c_1$ is a society of $c_2=k_2$ with cultural aspects $k_1$.
$x_{1}$ is a screw [fastener] for purpose $x_{2}$, threads [pitch, material] $x_{3}$, frame [size, material] $x_{4}$.
$s1$ pertains to culture of $s2=k2$
valsi.notes: Cultural gismu replacement lujvo for cultures: From gismu {kulnu} and {srana}

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is social anthropology.
$x_{1}$ (obj.) is loose/bloused/not tight on $x_{2}$ (obj.) at locus $x_{3}$.
$z_1$ is a taboo in culture $z_2=k_1$.
pro-sumti: you (imperative); make it true for you, the listener.
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #1 (specified by goi).
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #2 (specified by goi).
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #3 (specified by goi).
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #4 (specified by goi).
$x_1$ is a coyote of subspecies/breed $x_2$.
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #5 (specified by goi).
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of cabbage/lettuce/leafy vegetable of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is mustard of species/variety $x_2$.
korbi modal, 1st place (bordered by) bounded by ...
$x_1$ is a cognac distilled from grapes $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {xalka}, {jikru}, {vanjyjikru}, {vanju}. For brandies without an AOC designation use {vanjyjikru}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=z_1$ is at an edge/margin/border/curb/boundary of $x_2=k_2$ next-to/bordering-on $x_3=k_3$; $x_1=z_1$ skirts $x_2=k_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a corner/point/at-least-3-dimensional [solid] angle [shape/form] in/on $x_{2}$, of material $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also apex; a corner exists on three dimensions but need not be limited to points; it suggests a discontinuity in slope in some direction; i.e. in some planar cross-section. See also {jipno}, {konju}, {bliku}, {fanmo}, {jganu}, {krasi}.

valsi.definition: Coca-Cola.
$x_1$ is a ladybug/ladybird/lady beetle of genus/species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a coconut of variety/cultivar $x_2$
$x_1$ is a sausage made of $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Not necessarily with a gut skin; see also {tisycanti}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a pigeon/dove of genus/species $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of coal/peat/anthracite/bitumen from source $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a comb [many-needled shape] of material $x_{2}$ with tines/needles $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is concerto number $x_2$ in key $x_3$ composed by $x_4$ performed by/at $x_5$( event).
valsi.notes: Cf. {zgike}, {nolzgi}, {konceto zei pagbu}, {pipnrpaino zei konceto}, {jgitrviolino zei konceto}, {simfoni}, {zgifi'i}.

valsi.definition: $p_1$ is a movement of concerto for solo instruments $k_2$, number $k_3$ in key $k_4$ composed by $k_5$.
$x_1$ is a condom of $x_2$ size for $x_3$ sex and $x_4$ material
$x_1$ pertains to the Confucist culture/religion/ethos in aspect $x_2$
$x_1$ is konjac of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a cone [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$ with vertex $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is an edge/margin/border/curb/boundary of $x_{2}$ next-to/bordering-on $x_{3}$.
(adjective:) $x_{1}$ is bent/crooked/not straight or direct/[twisted]/folded.
$t_1$ controls $g_1=t_2$ who crosses $g_2=k_1$ to $g_3=k_2$ from $g_4=k_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of cork/bark from tree/species $x_{2}$; [material].
$s_1=k_1$ is a cortex (outermost layer) of structure $s_3=k_2$.
valsi.notes: x2 may be an organ, a cell, a plant, or a rock. Cf. {skapi}, {pilka}, {sefta}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is a crow/raven of species $s_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a coat/jacket/sweater/cloak/[cape/shawl/pullover] [extra outer garment] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a cotyledon of seed $x_2$ of plant $x_3$.
$g_1$ is Scotland (country).
$x_1$ is the duration of $x_2$.
$gas_1$ resets/changes $gal_1$ to its original value/content.
$x_1$ (NU) is a legal/moral entitlement of $x_2$ (individual/mass) by standard $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Normative principles, variously construed as legal, social, or moral freedoms or entitlements. {rarkrali} for "natural rights and {flakrali} for "legal rights"; {xuskrali} for "claim rights" and {zifkrali} for "liberty rights"; {crukrali} for "positive rights" and {ri'urkrali} for "negative rights"; {sepkrali} for "individual rights" and {gumkrali} for "group rights"; {selcemkrali} for "civil rights" and {seljeckrali} for "political rights"; {jiknykrali} for "economic rights", {jikykrali} for "social rights", and {klukrali} for "cultural rights"; {remkrali} for "human rights" and {dalkrali} for "animal rights". Cf. {selfla}, {selzi'e}, {terzi'e}, {selzau}, {selpikta}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a starfruit/carambola of variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ local area unit(s) [non-metric] (default 1) by standard $x_{3}$, $x_{4}$ subunits.
valsi.notes: (additional subunit places may be added as $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (site/event) is a source/start/beginning/origin of $x_{2}$ (object/event/process).
valsi.notes: Also root (figurative sense); (adjective:) $x_1$ is initial. See also {fanmo}, cmavo list {ra'i}, {sabji}, {cfari}, {jipno}, {traji}, {kojna}, {genja}, {jicmu}, {sitna}, {jinto}.

valsi.definition: $s_1=k_1$ is the origin of $s_2=k_2$.
$x_1$ is a hawthorn of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ represents/is an agent/proxy/stands-in for [absent] $x_{2}$ in matter(s)/function(s) $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also: on behalf of. See also cmavo list {ka'i}, {jansu}, {catni}, {vipsi}, {pulji}.

valsi.definition: $b_1$ is wig/toupee/mirkin worn by $k_2$ on body location $k_3$.
$b_1$ is an amount of velvet/velour/towelling/tufted cloth of type/material $b_2$.
$x_{1}$ (event) is the $x_{3}$'rd recurrence/repetition of $x_{2}$ (abstract); $x_{2}$ happens again in [form] $x_{1}$.
valsi.notes: Also case, another, instance, different, other, time, occasion. See also {fukpi}, {rapli}, {cafne}, {fasnu}, {xruti}.

valsi.definition: $ka_1=ke_2$ has disheveled/tousled hair
$x_1$ washes $x_2$'s hair, removing $x_3$ with shampoo $x_4$.
$s_1$ is dandruff on the head of $k_2$.
$x_1$ is a shampoo for washing $x_2$'s hair, removing $x_3$, used by $x_4$.
$x_1=v_1$ shaves/[removes hair] $x_2=k_1=v_2$ from $x_3=k_2=v_3$
valsi.notes: Applies to any form of hair removal, not necessarily with a blade.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ believes [regardless of evidence/proof] belief/creed $x_{2}$ (du'u) is true/assumed about subject $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: "without evidence" refers to objective external evidence; also gives credence, has conviction. See also {jinvi}, {djuno}, {censa}, {cevni}, {lijda}, {makfa}, {malsi}, {senpi}, {birti}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ plays cricket against $x_2$ in competition $x_3$ for prize/title $x_4$.
$x_1$ is a krill of genus/species $x_2$
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of crystal of composition $x_{2}$ in form/arrangement $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$: composition including $x_2$, which need not be complete specification. See also {jemna}, {bisli}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (event/state) is a reason/justification/explanation for/causing/permitting $x_{2}$ (event/state).
valsi.notes: See also {ciksi}, {rinka}, {nibli}, {mukti}, se {jalge}, te {zukte}, cmavo list {ki'u}, {bapli}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a clove bud/tree of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ cries out/yells/howls sound $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is a crier.
$x_1$ croquets $x_2$'s ball.
$b_1=k_1$ bends under conditions $b_3$.
$k_1=g_1$ is bow/arc supporting/restraining $g_2$, of material $g_3$.
$x_1$ plays croquet against $x_2$ in competition $x_3$ for prize/title $x_4$.
$x_1$ is a crocodile (family Crocodylidae) of breed $x_2$
$r_1$ (event/state) bends/flexes $k_1$ under conditions $r_3$.
$r_1=k_1$ curtseys in front of $r_2$.
$s_1=k_1$ bows/takes a bow on surface $s_2$ supported by limbs/supports $s_3$.
$x_1$ is an ani of species $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ intersects/crosses/traverses $x_{2}$ at locus $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of cream/emulsion/puree [consistency] of composition $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: [$x_2$: composition including $x_2$, which need not be complete specification]]; See also {ladru}, {matne}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a curve/turn/bend in $x_{2}$, at locus $x_{3}$, and defined by set of points/properties $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: (adjective:) $x_1$ is curved; ($x_4$ as a set of points is sufficiently specified to identify the relevant properties of the bend). See also {korcu}, {bargu}, {genxu}, {linji}, {sirji}.

valsi.definition: elidable terminator: end description, modal, or negator sumti; often elidable.
non-logical connective: intersection of sets.
elidable terminator: end mathematical (mex) forethought (Polish) expression; often elidable.
discursive: however/but/in contrast.
discursive: hence/therefore.
valsi.notes: Used to draw conclusions in accordance with what said previously, as opposed to {ku'i} (in contrast).

valsi.definition: elidable terminator: end NOI relative clause; always elidable, but preferred in complex clauses.
kulnu modal, 1st place in culture ...
Lent
$x_1$ is a quark with flavor $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a cube/regular polyhedron/polygon of dimensions $x_{2}$ (def. 3), surfaces/sides $x_{3}$ (def. 6).
valsi.notes: (cf. kurfa - needed for 'cube', bliku for a physical object; tanbo, tapla, tarmi)

valsi.definition: $kl1=ku1$ (goer) crosses $ku2$ at point $kl4=ku3$ to reach (destination) $kl2$ using vehicle $kl5$
$l_1$ cross examines $l_2$.
$x_{1}$ is curious/wonders about/is interested in/[inquisitive about] $x_{2}$ (object/abstract).
$x_1$ is a cross made of $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a crucifix.
$g_1$ folds/crosses/intertwines $s_1$(set).
$ x_1=v_1=k_1$ is a word/quotation crossing other words/quotations, meaning/defined by $x_2=v_2$, located at $x_3=k_3$
valsi.notes: Across -RefEntity "gt" {pinta}, down -RefEntity "gt" {sraji}, crossword puzzle -RefEntity "gt" "kucyvla se {namkei}". Example: "12 across: what you like -RefEntity "gt" beautiful" is "zo melbi cu kucyvla lu da poi do nelci li'u li pare poi pinta". $x_1$ may be a non grammatical quotation.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ feels comfort/is comfortable with conditions/environmental property(ies) $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ reflects Seri culture/language in aspect $x_2$
$m_1$ is a nurse to/nurses $m_2$.
$j_1=k_1$ nurses/holds with care $j_2=k_2$ (object/event/person) with/in $j_3$ (part of j1).
$f_1=k_1$ is fermented with fermenting agent $f_2$, tasty to observer $x_3=k_2$.
$x1=k1=t1$ is most delicious of set $x2=t4$ to observer $x3=k2$
$z_2=k_1$ is something made by $z_1$ out of $z_3$ that is pleasing/delightful to sense $k_2$.
$z_2=k_1$ is something made by $z_1$ out of $z_3$ that is pleasing/delightful to sense $k_2$.
$x_{1}$ is delicious/tasty/delightful to observer/sense $x_{2}$ [person, or sensory activity].
$ci_1$ is a term/semester with interval $ci_2$ of year $ci_3$ for school $ck_1$.
valsi.notes: x2 may be formed with "bi'o". Cf. {citsi}, {ckule}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=g_1$ works on $x_2=g_2$ with goal/purpose $x_3=g_3$ which is associated to school $x_4=c_1$ at $x_5=c_2$ teaching subject(s) $x_6=c_3$ to audience/communicty $x_7=c_4$ (of which $x_1$ is a part) operated by $x_8=c_5$
$k_4=m_1$ graduates/completes coursework from $k_1$ at location $k_2$ in subject matter $k_3$, by the standards of the administration $k_5=m_3$
valsi.notes: This is really a dropped SE of velkulmu'o. m2 is the implied "property of learning at k2 subject matter k3 from school k1"

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is Norwegian/pertains to Norwegian culture in aspect $x_2$.
$x_1$ is Turkish/pertains to Turkish culture in aspect $x_2$.
$x_1$ is Turkic/pertains to Turkic culture in aspect $x_2$
$x_{1}$ [mass of ideas, customs, skills, arts] is culture of nation/ethos $x_{2}$ (mass); $x_{1}$ is ethnic.
valsi.notes: (note that $x_2$ is NOT individual; culture is what is shared among people and is not an individual trait). See also cmavo list {ka'u}, cmavo list {ku'u}, {natmi}, {cecmu}.

valsi.definition: $p_1$ is a diploma entitling $p_2$ to entitlement/privilege $p_3$ (event/state) from school/institute/academy $x_4=c_1$ teaching subject(s) $x_5=c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a room of/in structure $x_{2}$ surrounded by partitions/walls/ceiling/floor $x_{3}$ (mass/jo'u).
$x_{1}$ is a camel/llama/alpaca/vicuna/dromedary of species/breed $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Llama (= {tcokumte}), Bactrian camel (= {zdokumte}); Arabian camel/dromedary (= {rabykumte}). See also {sunla}, {kanla}, {xirma}, {xasli}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a guanaco of breed $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a llama of breed $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is an alpaca of breed $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a vicuna of breed $x_{2}$.
$z_1=k_1$ is an apartment for $z_2$ in structure $k_2$.
valsi.notes: A complete domicile occupying only part of a building. Cf. {zdani}, {selxa'u}.

valsi.definition: $g_1$ is a/the metals and mining industry/sector producing/mining $g_2=k_1$ of type/metal $k_2$ from location $k_3$ by process $g_3$
$x_1=ka_1$ (agent) mines material/ore $x_2=ku_1=ka_2$ of type $x_3=ku_2$ from mine/source $x_4=ku_3=ka_3$ using tool $x_5=ka_4$.
valsi.notes: Used in Theodore Reed's translation of A Princess of Mars.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is/contains/is made from a mineral/ore of type/metal $x_{2}$ mined from location/lode/mine $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is/contains/is made from lapis lazuli of type/grade $x_2$ mined from location $x_3$.
$x_1$ is/contains/is made from marble of type $x_2$ mined from location $x_3$.
$x_1$ is/contains/is made from alabaster of type $x_2$ mined from location $x_3$.
$s_1$=$t_1$ is mineralogy [science about minerals] based on methodology $s_3$.
valsi.notes: kunra2, kunra3 and saske2 subsumed. See also {derske}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ [container] is empty/vacant of $x_{2}$ [material]; $x_{1}$ is hollow.
valsi.notes: Also vacuum (= kunti be roda/so'ada). See also {culno}, {tisna}, {claxu}, {canlu}, {kevna}, {setca}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a right-angled shape/form defined by set of vertices $x_{2}$, dimensions $x_{3}$ (default 2).
valsi.notes: Also rectangle, square, rectilinear; square (= {kubykurfa}, {pitkubykurfa}), cube (= {kurkubli}), rectangle (= {clakurfa}), rhombus/diamond (= {sa'orkurfa}, {sa'orpitkubli}). See also {bliku}, {kubli}, {tapla}, {salpo}, {tarmi}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ takes-care-of/looks after/attends to/provides for/is caretaker for $x_{2}$ (object/event/person).
valsi.notes: Also tends, cares for, keeps; $x_1$ is a keeper/custodian of $x_2$. See also {jundi}, {cinri}, {prami}, {raktu}, {zgana}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is bitter/acrid/sharply disagreeable to observer/sense $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a weevil of genus/species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is turmeric of species/variety $x_2$.
$m_1$ is a check/checkerboard pattern of squares $k_1=m_2$ arranged in structure $m_3$
valsi.notes: x2 might be a set of colors, with x3 specifying their arrangement

valsi.definition: $t_1$ is the square of $t_2$.
$x_1$ is a spice of the mint family, with flavor $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a quantity of couscous of ingredients including $x_2$
$x_{1}$ ranges/extends/spans/persists/reaches across/over interval/gap/area/scope/extent/range $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (person) is cruel/mean/unkind to victim $x_{2}$.
$k_1=t_1$ governs and oppresses $k_2=t_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a cruel-captain with object of cruelty-captained $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ a tautology by standard/epistemology/metaphysics $x_2$.
$t_1=k_1$ is a desert located in/at $t_2$
letteral for k.
